Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The biochemical assays on the influence of four analgesics on the brain concentration and turnover of noradrenaline ( NA ) were also performed .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| noradrenaline (NA) |

In this paragraph, the only explicitly mentioned chemical entity is noradrenaline (NA). The other terms, such as "analgesics" and "brain concentration and turnover," do not refer to specific chemicals, but rather to classes of compounds and processes.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| noradrenaline (NA) |

In this paragraph, the only explicitly mentioned chemical entity is noradrenaline (NA). The term "analgesics" refers to a class of drugs that relieve pain, but it does not specify which particular chemical compound is being referred to. Therefore, it is not included in the table. Similarly, "brain concentration and turnover" refers to a process rather than a specific chemical entity.
